settings.title: Test Ride & Local Dealers
settings.text:
Would you like to test or buy BeeCool e-bikes offline? Please check the following test spots or offline dealers. Email or call the representatives at the spot to make a reservation about the walk-in time for testing or offline purchase.

As for all the after-sales problems, please contact our official customer service staff directly and provide the corresponding proof for your issues. Do not contact our offline dealers directly for after-sales problems without consulting us first or we will not bear the repairing cost/purchase cost of the replacement parts unauthorized by our official customer service staff directly.
